title: Wear My Number
summary: Check your phone number quickly with one tap on your watch
description: Check your phone number quickly with one tap on your mobile or watchIf you're as forgetful as me you know it's impossible to remember your phone number. With this simple app you don't have to. Your phone number is just a tap away whether it's on your Android wear device or mobile phone. Your phone number is automatically detected or you can edit it manually. You can check quickly on your watch what your phone number is. It's easy.
descriptionHTML:
Check your phone number quickly with one tap on your mobile or watch

If you're as forgetful as me you know it's impossible to remember your phone number. With this simple app you don't have to. Your phone number is just a tap away whether it's on your Android wear device or mobile phone. Your phone number is automatically detected or you can edit it manually. You can check quickly on your watch what your phone number is. It's easy.
